title: PubMed Search Articles Output
description: Output schema for PubMed article search results

searchParameters.description: The search parameters used for this query

effectiveESearchTerm.description: The effective ESearch query term constructed from input parameters

totalFound.description: Total number of articles found matching the search criteria

retrievedPmidCount.description: Number of PMIDs retrieved in this response

pmids.description: Array of PubMed Unique Identifiers (PMIDs) found

briefSummaries.description: Brief summaries for top PMIDs (if fetchBriefSummaries > 0)

eSearchUrl.description: URL of the ESearch API call made

eSummaryUrl.description: URL of the ESummary API call made (if brief summaries were fetched)
